actions.committee: Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committees.committee: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

official_title: A bill to provide enhanced criminal penalties for willful violations of occupational standards for asbestos.

summary.text: Asbestos Standards Enforcement Act of 2005 - Amends the Occupational Safety and Health Act of 1970 to subject any employer convicted of willfully violating a standard issued with respect to the control of occupational exposure to asbestos to a fine and/or up to five years' imprisonment for a first offense or a fine and/or up to 10 years' imprisonment for subsequent convictions.

titles.title: A bill to provide enhanced criminal penalties for willful violations of occupational standards for asbestos.
